item.title: Gaussian Process Regression and Classification with PyMC3

item.title: Introduction to Probabilistic Machine Learning with PyMC3
item.description: Pre-requisites: Only a laptop with a modern web browser like Google chrome or Mozilla Firefox. Click the Binder icon below to open the notebooks in a web browser without installing any software.

item.title: Introduction to Probabilistic Machine Learning with Stan
item.description: Pre-requisites: The following software tools are required to run the demo(s): R + RStudio:- Follow this link to install R. Also install RStudio. rstan:- Follow this link to install rstan. bayesplot:- Follow this link to install bayesplot
